General.Name: Krsnaa Diagnostics Limited
General.Description: Krsnaa Diagnostics Limited provides diagnostic services. The company offers a range of technology-enabled diagnostic services, such as radiology, pathology/clinical laboratory, and tele-radiology services to public and private hospitals, medical colleges, and community health centers. As of March 31, 2022, it operated 2,071 diagnostic centers in approximately 14 states in India. The company was incorporated in 2010 and is based in Pune, India.
